questions.question: Why did Monica's mom say she and Ross couldn't play football?
questions.correct_answer: Because they were too competitive
questions.explanation: Monica's mom said they couldn't play football because they were too competitive and it led to fights.

questions.question: What did Ross's dad do with the Geller Cup?
options: He threw it in the lake
questions.correct_answer: He threw it in the lake
questions.explanation: Ross's dad threw the Geller Cup in the lake because he was sick of their fighting.

questions.question: What was the score when Monica and Ross decided to make the game about the guys against the girls?
questions.explanation: The score was 42-21 in favor of Monica's team when they decided to make the game about the guys against the girls.

questions.question: Why did Chandler want to ask Margha for her number?
options: Because he wanted to get over Janice
Because he wanted to play a prank on Joey
questions.correct_answer: Because he wanted to get over Janice
questions.explanation: Chandler wanted to ask Margha for her number as a way to get over his ex-girlfriend Janice.

questions.question: What did Phoebe do to distract Chandler during the game?
questions.correct_answer: She flashed him
questions.explanation: Phoebe flashed Chandler to distract him during the game, causing him to stop and stare.

questions.question: What was the final score of the game?
options: The game ended in a tie
questions.explanation: The final score of the game was 42-21 in favor of Monica's team.

questions.question: Why did Monica tackle Chandler during the game?
options: Because he was on the opposing team
Because he was being too aggressive
Because she wanted to prove a point
questions.correct_answer: Because she wanted to prove a point
questions.explanation: Monica tackled Chandler to prove a point and show that she was a formidable opponent.

questions.question: What did Rachel do when she was given the opportunity to throw the ball?
options: She ran away with the ball
She threw the ball at Monica's eye
questions.correct_answer: She threw the ball at Monica's eye
questions.explanation: Rachel threw the ball at Monica's eye when she was given the opportunity to throw the ball.

questions.question: What was the name of the trophy that Ross and Monica's dad threw in the lake?
questions.correct_answer: The Geller Cup
questions.explanation: The trophy that Ross and Monica's dad threw in the lake was called the Geller Cup.

questions.question: Why did Margha decide not to choose either Joey or Chandler?
options: Because she didn't like either of them
Because she thought they were both shallow
Because she wanted to play football instead
Because she didn't understand the question
questions.correct_answer: Because she thought they were both shallow
questions.explanation: Margha decided not to choose either Joey or Chandler because she thought they were both shallow after Chandler's behavior.

questions.question: What did Phoebe say to Monica when Monica asked her to do a button-hook again?
options: She said she would do it
She said she wouldn't do it
She said she didn't know how to do it
She said Monica should let Rachel throw the ball instead
questions.correct_answer: She said Monica should let Rachel throw the ball instead
questions.explanation: Phoebe suggested that Monica let Rachel throw the ball instead of doing a button-hook again.

questions.question: What did Ross say to Monica when she said she was going to win the game?
options: He said he would accept the loss
He said he would only play if she agreed to a rematch
questions.correct_answer: He said she was cheating
questions.explanation: Ross accused Monica of cheating when she said she was going to win the game.

questions.question: What did Joey say to Chandler when Chandler said he was going to ask Margha for her number?
options: He said he should go for it
He said he would let Chandler have her
He said he would ask her out himself
He said Chandler didn't have a chance
questions.correct_answer: He said he would let Chandler have her
questions.explanation: Joey told Chandler that he would let him have Margha, but later decided to compete with him for her attention.

questions.question: What did Monica say to Ross when he made a comment about her team being better?
options: She said she would prove it to him
She said he could join her team
questions.correct_answer: She said she would prove it to him
questions.explanation: Monica told Ross that she would prove to him that her team was better.

questions.question: What did Phoebe do when she got the ball during the game?
options: She ran with the ball and scored a touchdown
questions.correct_answer: She ran with the ball and scored a touchdown
questions.explanation: Phoebe ran with the ball and scored a touchdown during the game.

questions.question: What did Rachel say when Monica asked her to go long during the game?
options: She said she would go long
She said she didn't want to go long
She said she couldn't go long
She said she would rather throw the ball
questions.correct_answer: She said she would rather throw the ball
questions.explanation: Rachel asked Monica if she could throw the ball instead of going long.

questions.question: What did Monica say to Phoebe when she asked her to do a button-hook?
options: She said Phoebe should do it
She said Phoebe shouldn't do it
She said Phoebe could do it if she wanted to
She said Phoebe should let Rachel do it instead
questions.correct_answer: She said Phoebe should do it
questions.explanation: Monica told Phoebe to do a button-hook during the game.

questions.question: What did Joey say to Chandler when Chandler tackled him during the game?
options: He said Chandler was out of bounds
He said Chandler was a good player
He said Chandler ripped his favorite jersey
questions.correct_answer: He said Chandler ripped his favorite jersey
questions.explanation: Joey told Chandler that he ripped his favorite jersey during the game.

options: He said he would accept the loss
He said he would only play if she agreed to a rematch
questions.correct_answer: He said she was cheating

She said he could join her team

questions.explanation: Monica told Ross that she would prove to him that she could win the game.

questions.explanation: Phoebe said 'I love this game!' when she scored her first touchdown.

questions.correct_answer: He said hi, I'm Joey

He said he would ask her out himself
